detail_desc: T-shirt in soft, striped cotton jersey with embroidered text on the front.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a detachable, pile-lined hood with a faux fur trim and stand-up collar. Zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, flap side pockets with a hook and loop fastening and a small zipped chest pocket . Ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Double-breasted jacket in jersey made from a viscose blend with a slight sheen. Peak lapels, a gently tapered waist, jetted front pockets and a single back vent. Lined.

Short, fitted dress in jersey with a V-neck, wrapover top and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Seam at the waist and a skirt with gathered, vertical seams for a draped effect and a flounce at the hem. Lined bodice.
Boxy top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed stand-up collar and zip at the top. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Pyjamas with a short-sleeved nursing top and shorts in soft organic cotton jersey. Top with sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves and a wrapover front with a practical inner top for easier nursing access. Shorts with an elasticated waist panel below the tummy for added comfort.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Knee-length dress in woven fabric with a boat neck, 3/4-length sleeves with a slit and button at the cuffs, and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Fitted, knee-length dress in ribbed jersey with short sleeves.
Long-sleeved dresses in printed cotton jersey with a seam at the hips and flounced skirt.
Short, off-the-shoulder blouse in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Short sleeves with smocked trims and smocking at the top and hem.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Jacket in woven fabric with a print motif front and back, a drawstring hood and press-studs down the front. Long raglan sleeves with elasticated cuffs, side pockets, and a drawstring at the hem. Lined.
Short dress in woven fabric with a V-neck, wrapover front with a concealed press-stud, a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and short dolman sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Pyjamas in soft satin. V-neck top with narrow adjustable shoulder straps and lace at the top. Short shorts with an elasticated waist and frilled hems.
Boots in imitation leather with an ankle-height shaft, lacing at the front and a zip on one side. Fabric linings and insoles and chunky soles. Heel 2.5 cm.

LIMITED EDITION. Shorter-style blouse in crinkled, gathered chiffon. Double layer front and back, and sections in a sturdier weave at the yoke, cuffs and hem. Small opening with a covered button at the back of the neck, balloon sleeves, asymmetric cuffs with a covered button, and covered buttons at the sides of the hem.
Fully lined swimsuit in fast-drying functional fabric. Narrow cut at the top with a zip at the front.

Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a button-down collar, classic front and yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the shoulders and chest which, combined with a gently tapered waist, creates a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre with a low waist, lined gusset, decorative rings at the sides and a high cut at the back.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Wide-fitting top with short dolman sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Sandals with wide, crossover straps at the front and an elastic heel strap at the back. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles.

Patterned set with a short-sleeved top and pair of shorts. The top has a wide neckline with narrow, covered elastication, and decorative ties at the hem. Wide shorts with covered elastication at the waist.
Hats in soft cotton jersey.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
T-shirt in slub cotton jersey with a chest pocket, ribbing around the neckline and short slits in the sides.
Sleeveless blouse in a crinkled viscose weave with a V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the front, wide flounce at the front that continues over the shoulders, and an elasticated hem.
Short, sleeveless, A-line dress in woven fabric. Narrow cut at the top with gathers front and back and a decorative bow on one shoulder. Unlined.
Brazilian briefs in lace and mesh with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Trainers in imitation suede with a lightly padded edge and lacing at the front. Jersey linings, canvas insoles and rubber soles.
Sunglasses with plastic and metal frames and UV-protective, tinted mirrored lenses.
Short skirt in washed stretch denim with a zip fly and button, side pockets and a coin pocket. Scalloped hem with a broderie anglaise trim.
Metal earrings with a pendant in the shape of a flower. Length 7.5 cm.
T-shirt in slub linen jersey with a slightly wider neckline and short sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey with a round neck and straight-cut hem.
Pull-on trousers in an airy weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist and a back pocket. Relaxed fit with tapered legs.
Sturdy bucket bag in imitation leather with a handle and a detachable, adjustable shoulder strap. Drawstring and magnetic press-stud at the top. Unlined. Size 14.5x29x30 cm.
Belt in imitation suede with a metal buckle decorated with inset pearly beads. Width 2.5 cm.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft knit with a text appliqué in plastic beads and sequins on the front, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Straight-cut shirt woven in a cupro blend with a collar, V-neck and concealed buttons. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and cuffs with a covered button.
Bag in soft imitation suede with a drawstring closure, handle and detachable, adjustable shoulder strap at the top. Unlined. Size 18x27x32.5 cm..
Patterned swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Fitted top in a soft rib knit with a V-neck front and back and long sleeves.
Knee-length cardigan in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves and no buttons.
Low-rise cargo trousers in stretch twill with side pockets, flap leg pockets with a press-stud, decorative flap back pockets and skinny, ankle-length legs.

Set with a shirt in soft cotton flannel and T-shirt in cotton jersey. Shirt with a collar, yoke at the back and buttons down the front. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a curved hem. Classic T-shirt with a ribbed neckline.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit merino wool with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Metal watch with a narrow, adjustable strap in imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width of strap approx. 1.5 cm, total length 22 cm. Diameter of watch 3.5 cm.

Sporty jacket in sturdy jersey with a zip down the front and a mesh-lined hood with an elastic drawstring. Chest pocket with a concealed zip, side pockets, ribbed cuffs and narrow elastication at the hem.
Narrow, reversible belt with a metal buckle. One side in leather, the other in suede. Width 3 cm.
Blouse in a viscose weave with a small, lace stand-up collar, button placket and lace section at the top. Long sleeves with elasticated cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey with a chest pocket and sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.
Socks in a soft jacquard knit containing some wool.
Metal Alice band decorated with a glittery princess crown.
Trainers in mesh with imitation leather details, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles.

Chinos in extra-stretchy cotton twill with a zip fly, side pockets, a coin pocket and welt back pockets with a button. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Pyjamas with a T-shirt and shorts. Jersey T-shirt with short slits in the sides. Cotton shorts with an elasticated waist and side pockets.
Jacket in soft fleece with a high collar, zip down the front and a yoke in woven fabric. Side pockets, a zipped chest pocket, and narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem.
High-waisted shorts in washed, stretch denim with a zip fly and button, back pockets and slim legs. The cotton content of the shorts is partly recycled.
Cardigan in a soft, double-knit cotton blend with a V-neck, buttons down the front with a stocking-stitched button band, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Leggings in heavy, organic cotton jersey with glittery details and a soft brushed inside. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.
Trousers in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and elasticated hems.
Scarf in a soft, loose weave with fringe trims on the short sides. Size 80x200 cm.
Long-sleeved dress in soft, printed cotton jersey with a seam at the waist and a flared skirt.
Baby Exclusive. Dungaree dress in soft, double-weave organic cotton. Adjustable straps with buttons and a seam at the waist that is elasticated at the back. Lined at the top.

Set with a long-sleeved shirt and pair of 5-pocket trousers in a cotton weave. Shirt with a collar, buttons down the front, a chest pocket, buttoned cuffs and a gently rounded hem. Trousers in supersoft twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 10-12Y) and zip fly and button.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.

Ankle-length trousers in twill with a high paper bag waist with pleats and a detachable tie belt. Zip fly, concealed hook-and-eye fastening, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and wide, tapered legs.

Pyjama top and shorts in softly draping satin. V-neck cami top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Lined at the top. Shorts with narrow elastication and a small frill trim at the waist and wide legs.
Long-sleeved top in lace with a contrasting colour lining in a crêpe weave. Round neckline, an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck and a rounded hem.

Shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with an adjustable shoulder strap with a metal buckle and a zip at the top. One outer compartment with a concealed zip and one zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size 4x22x22 cm.
Hipster briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Calf-length dress in soft, gently draping viscose twill with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Fine-knit tights with extra space for a growing tummy.
Short dress in organic cotton jersey. Opening with ties at the top, short cap sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist.
Straight-cut blouse in airy, crinkled fabric with a V-neck, ties at the neckline and short, pleated balloon sleeves. Lined.
Brazilian briefs in ribbed microfibre with a mid waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, lined hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
